author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Moody's Places Punjab National Bank's Ratings Under Review For Downgrade​
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) -
* ‍MOODY‘S PLACES PUNJAB NATIONAL BANK‘S RATINGS UNDER REVIEW FOR DOWNGRADE​
* ‍MOODY‘S -PLACED UNDER REVIEW FOR DOWNGRADE PNB‘S LOCAL AND FOREIGN CURRENCY DEPOSIT RATING OF BAA3/P-3 AND FOREIGN CURRENCY ISSUER RATING BAA3
* MOODY‘S -ASSUMES VERY HIGH PROBABILITY OF GOVERNMENT SUPPORT FOR PNB IN TIMES OF NEED, RESULTING IN THREE-NOTCH UPLIFT TO DEPOSIT AND ISSUER RATINGS FROM BCA Source text for Eikon:
